item.title: HSC Seminar
item.description: Winter 2021 2/2/21 - Constructing and Using Families of Hardware Accelerators, Ross Daly (Stanford), webinar 2/9/21 - PyLog: An Algorithm-Centric Python-Based FPGA Programming and Synthesis Flow, Sitao Hang (UIUC), webinar 2/16/21 - An Open-Source Platform for Heterogeneous Computing, Luca Carloni (Columbia), webinar 2/23/21 - GPU-accelerated Static Timing Analysis, Tsung-Wei Huang (Utah), webinar 3/2/21 - Sherief Reda (Brown), webinar 3/9/21 - Building Cache-Coherent, Heterogeneous-ISA Processors Using P-Mesh, Jonathan Balkind (UCSB), talk details, webinar

item.title: Publications

Sheng-Hong Wang, Rafael Trapani Possignolo, Haven Blake Skinner, Jose Renau, LiveHD: A Productive Live Hardware Development Flow. IEEE Micro 40(4), 67-75, 2020. Grant Ayers, Heiner Litz, Christos Kozyrakis, Parthasarathy Ranganathan, Classifying Memory Access Patterns for Prefetching.
